div.head: 傷寒陽明證
div.div: harm caused by cold with signs in the yang brilliance

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with signs in the yang brilliance

sense.def: Pathological Condition of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, with signs such as a hot body and sweating, no aversion to cold, but an aversion to heat instead, and in some cases with abdominal fullness and difficulties in defecating. Shang han lei zheng huo ren shu 傷寒類證活人書 1: 大抵傷寒陽 明證宜下，少陰證宜温 , “In general, in the case of harm caused by cold with signs in the yang brilliance section it is advisable to purge; with signs in the minor yin section it is advisable to add warmth”.
